description_of_request: One month of electric bills relating to municipal roadway lighting, including both Supply amd Delivery charges

Any and All information, records, permits, names of drivers, names of floats, and float assignments re: August 11, 2007 Bud Billiken Parade; any and all incidents reports or accident reports re: same.

Information about the city's costs related to Taste of Chicago. I would like to find out total expenses with city services and net revenue with city service expenses. I would also like to get the same information for any lakefront festivals other than the Taste for which requests for proposal will be sent out in an effort to look for private companies to take over running the festivals.
All Copies of permits, applications and any other documents directly or indirectly associated with activities by Paramount Pictures

copies of any documents that are to be given to potential bidding companies as part of the process to see RFP to privatize Chiago's lakefront festivals including bu t not limited to the Taste of Chiago.  Copies of any responses to the RFP from individual companies
Information on the Taste of Chicago: list of how many vendors; process by which musical acts have been booked to perform; budget for entertainment
How much has the city spent on Taste of Chicago each year
Information regarding Transformers 3 filming permits; dates of filming, locations of filming, jobs provided and money involved.

Information on event held on the N. Oakley Block, 1800n to 1890 on August 21, 2010
A list of applications for a permit to hold a Black Party
A list of Block Club Contacts for Wards 2, 24, 27, 28, 29 and 37.

request information related to any report or study done for or on the behalf of the city of Chicago regarding potential, proposed or existing, helipads or heliports and helicopter operations in the city of Chicago.
